article.headline: Howard 69, La Salle 63
article.story: WASHINGTON (AP) -- Eugene Myatt scored 20 points, Kandi Mukole added 17 and Howard came back from a 17-point second-half deficit to beat La Salle 69-63 Tuesday night. Howard (2-2) was down 47-30 with 16:24 left, but pulled ahead with an 18-5 run over the final 5:10. The Bison took their first lead, 60-59, on Randy Hampton's inside basket with about three minutes left. Rodney Green scored 17 points and Yves Mekongo Mbala had 10 rebounds for La Salle (1-2). The Explorers went nearly six minutes without a field goal at the end, allowing Howard to hold on despite missing five of its 12 free throws in the final two minutes. La Salle committed 18 turnovers to Howard's eight.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
